text_with_dna:
Okay, here's the DNA sequence embedded in surrounding text, following your rules:

The lab tech muttered something about needing to run the sequencer again. "I swear, this machine..." Then she typed: AGGCCAAAAAAGAGCGCCCCCAGAATTAGACCTACAGAAAAATTGCTTTGCAGTAACGGTTCATAAACGTAAATCATAAACGGTCCGGTCAAGACCAGGAT ugh, still getting weird readings. Maybe the buffer is contaminated? Time for coffee!
